评论概述: It does what a belt should do very well
评论详情: This is a very nice belt. I honestly bought it just because I liked the look if it and needed a new belt after poking too many holes in my last one. It was just going to be an accessory.  It has since claimed it's spot as my go-to belt. I'm not sure at what age that became a thing and I'm not sure I like that I have a go-to belt, but I can at least be okay with the actual belt. It's held up to an active job with zero cracks in the material, and no stretching.  I also really appreciate that the holes go around the complete length of the belt. Will I ever need most of them, no, but I have lost a bit of weight this past year and had to punch holes in my old belts. It's nice to know I won't have to do that again and the belt will just fit.  It's also been helpful because there are so many spots to attach tool lanyards. Has saved a few dropsies from the top of a ladder or while climbing through racking.

评论概述: Perfect Punk Rock Belt for Everyday Wear!
评论详情: I bought this double grommet black belt for my 16-year-old daughter, and she absolutely loves it! It has a great punk rock look with a smooth synthetic leather finish that feels sturdy and well-made. The double grommets give it an edgy style and also make it easy to adjust, so she can wear it comfortably now and, in the future, even if her size changes.  The belt pairs well with jeans and dresses, making it a versatile addition to her wardrobe. The material doesn’t wrinkle or wear easily, which is impressive given the affordable price. The only slight issue is that it has a bit of a leather scent when new but airing it out helped. Overall, it’s a fantastic value for anyone looking for a stylish, durable belt with a cool, edgy vibe!
Really happy with this belt! I do wish it had an interchangeable buckle though. Nonetheless, top notch quality and looks high end

The belt I got was the wide double grommet style. It's a good sturdy belt. I don't mind that it's synthetic leather since I wear it to work. It does the job. I got the size L and it fits well. I have a 40 waist but wanted the extra slack just in case it was on the smaller size. It does fit true to size. It is comfortable, I like the many holes and this is good, so is the price.

评论概述: Don't Remove the Roller on the Buckle
评论详情: The buckle should be better quality. I started to remove the roller from buckle and discovered that the buckle does not form a complete rectangle. There is a gap of approximately 3/4" hiding beneath the roller. I've taken the roller off of similar belts in the past and never saw one with a gap like that.  Otherwise, the belt seems to be decent quality for the price.
It's heavy and made well, very good quality! It's everything I wanted and more. Looks super cute on.

At first I was worried that this belt was going to be too long for me to wear, but it ended up fitting nicely. It has several pre-drilled holes for you to use the clasp on, which was able to accommodate my slim waist size. The box also comes with a hole punch in case you need to make a new hole, which is really thoughtful and convenient. It's a nice belt, and has a good feel to it. Stylish, but not overdone.

5.0 fit well good quality sizing was accurate compared to similar products this is priced well would recommended

I like the buckle on the belt that I picked out for sure. Otherwise it's a standard, sturdy belt; I didn't pick any of the styles that had an excess of studs or anything. So, "does what it says on the tin" applies here, but that's still a thumbs-up.

The belt feels nicely made and the leather seems high quality. The belt buckle is a little different in that it just has a peg on the back to put into the belt hole. I haven't had a belt like that so it was new to me. I am impressed that they also include a hole punch so you can add more if needed. It arrived well packaged and looks just like the photos.

评论概述: Very interesting buckle, but sewn in
评论详情: I got this because I wear belts and I was attracted to the unusual design of the belt buckle.The sizing is a little odd - it uses your actual waist size rather than your pants size.  I wear a size 32-33 jeans and the medium was just right for me.The buckle is nice, although I would have preferred a satin finish over the super shiny.  It does look good though.  However, the buckle is sewn in.  It's a standard style buckle, but I can't swap it to another belt without cutting it off.  That's a big negative for me.As the description states, the belt is fake leather.  It is soft and very flexible.  Hard to say how durable it'll be.The box it comes in is nice and would make a fine gift box.  It comes with a hole punch tool for making more holes if you need it, I thought that was a nice touch.

I have a similar belt that was one it's last leg so I'm happy to have found a good replacement in this BELTROAD Belt.  Although it's faux leather, it gives off the appearance of real leather and is made well.  I really like the double prong of the buckle and what makes the belt for me are the metal inside the grommets all over the belt.  Very rock and roll and I love wearing it!
The material is very nice. I like the double rivets. The buckle is nice and heavy and feels great. Don’t feel super easy to break. Many different holes for sizing.
Great quality
After 2 months of use, it has started to crumble. It was a sturdy belt when I first bought it but after the first month the area that had to bend into the buckle started to fall apart.
There's silver glitter that comes off the belt in the shiny version. It's not terrible in terms of how it makes the belt look, but it is annoying to have glitter everywhere in your room.
